comment.body:
Unfortunately, the reported issue does not satisfy our [filters policy](https://kb.adguard.com/en/general/adguard-filter-policy). The website has low visitors.
Please, add this rules to the user rules:
```
bgibola4.sbs##div[id^="float"]
bgibola4.sbs##.bannerbawahheader
bgibola4.sbs###sidebar
```

issue.title: forum.release-apk.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://forum.release-apk.com/search.php](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforum.release-apk.com%2Fsearch.php) ### Comment > Uninstalled previous AdGuard v3. Rebooted. Installed fresh latest AdGuard v4 > The most annoying part there is the countdown and permanent dynamic anti AdBlock check. If ads blocked user can't use the website even after waiting countdown to complete. It seems also there is a penalty the more you try to bypass the protection. (time sanction) ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/kyyoPlp.jpg)

comment.body:
It's Admiral. So, what you need to do:
1. Remove your rule
2. Add `pwinsider.com` to the Admiral rules in AdGuard Annoyances 
```adblock
/^https?:\/\/[^\/]+\.[^\/]+\/[a-zA-Z0-9_-]{32,}$/$script,third-party,domain=
! cannot be closed
! #%#//scriptlet("abort-current-inline-script", "document.createElement", "admiral")
```
3. Add `exchangedetail.com` to the same section and to AdGuard Tracking Protection. You'll see the note `! Add same rules to the Admiral section of Tracking Protection filter`.

comment.body:
Cannot reproduce with your settings. 
Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update.
Do not close AdGuard window ~60 seconds, because iOS will breaks configuration process.

Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

comment.body:
@piquark6046 we usually add `$domain` to regex rules, so please limit the rules.
```adblock
/^https:\/\/filmizletv\.vip/BH[0-9]+\.mp4/$media,redirect=noopmp4-1s,domain=filmizletv.vip
/^https:\/\/filmizletv\.vip\/su(b|p)erbet/$domain=filmizletv.vip
```
